TopicTitle: Twitch Thursday: The Golden Joystick build!

Articles.Content: <figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"><img data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480" alt="image" src="http://40.media.tumblr.com/041caa78de6e28c0c93aa7e30fac66cd/tumblr_inline_nxbf8wkbNn1rr2wit_540.jpg"/></figure><p><iframe src="http://player.twitch.tv/?video=v23261213" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" height="378" width="620"></iframe></p><p>To celebrate we won The Golden Joystick award DasValdez built one and the outcome is formidable! #KSP .<br/></p>
What mods is he using for visuals? EVE I expect for atmo, but what's the skybox?

What mods is he using for visuals? EVE I expect for atmo, but what's the skybox?

Here is a page with all his visual mods, the skybox is a custom one and there is a link to it too.
Someone should totally mod a part called "cupola ball".
